CustomField.description: This field appears on the "Standard Remove User" Page Layout. This is the date and time the employee should be disabled from all Newmarket Systems and Applications. This field is updated by members of the HR Department
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field appears on the "Standard Remove User" Page Layout. This is the date and time the employee should be disabled from all Newmarket Systems and Applications. This field is updated by members of the HR Department
CustomField.label: Employee Disable Date
